rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Small area for entry and reception with a welcoming foyer.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space designed as per Vastu guidelines with good east exposure.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area for family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern amenities and good ventilation, placed in the south as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room located on a quiet corner.

rooms.description: Fully equipped gym with sound insulation and ventilation, adhering to local safety norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with east exposure for positive energy, featuring an attached bathroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom with optimal light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Dedicated study or work space located in a quiet section of the floor.
